CustomField.formula: IF (AND((Apttus__VersionAware__c ),$Permission.CLM_Contract_Manager_Permission,$User.Id = OwnerId), IF(OR($User.UIThemeDisplayed == 'Theme4d', $User.UIThemeDisplayed == 'Theme4t', $User.UIThemeDisplayed == 'Theme4u'), HYPERLINK("/apex/Apttus__LightningOfflineDocumentImport?action=ImportSupportingDocument&id="&Id, IMAGE("/resource/Apttus__Button_ImportSupportingDocument", "Import Supporting Document"),"_self"), HYPERLINK("/apex/Apttus__OfflineDocumentImport?action=ImportSupportingDocument&id="&Id, IMAGE("/resource/Apttus__Button_ImportSupportingDocument", "Import Supporting Document"),"_self")), NULL)
CustomField.label: ImportSupportingDocument_Custom
